name: Green Zone
description: Included with your purchase is the ability to play an Indie project that will have you aiming for new high scores. The game comes with a menu and an interactive tutorial to clearly explain what to know during gameplay. Press escape during the game to open a menu. Move the square by moving your mouse and try to guide the square to the zones closest to the center of the screen. Wind will blow the square away from the center and it is your job to guide the square back against the wind. Earn zone-based points until time runs out. The timer starts at 60. The score, high score, timer, zone points, and wind direction are displayed at all times during gameplay. Good luck with your high-score hunting!
